languages.text: "Это мост, соединяющий наши сознания и сотворенный волей моего раба — того, чьей участи тебе следовало бы позавидовать. {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Псайкер{/g} достаточно полезен для меня, чтобы он мог жить. Ты... вряд ли".

traits.locale_text: "Это место — мост, соединяющий наши сознания и сотворенный волей моего раба — того, чьей участи тебе следовало бы позавидовать. Псайкер достаточно полезен для меня, чтобы он мог жить. Ты... вряд ли".

languages.text: "This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... less so."
languages.original_text: "Это мост, соединяющий наши сознания и сотворенный волей моего раба — того, чьей участи тебе следовало бы позавидовать. {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Псайкер{/g} достаточно полезен для меня, чтобы он мог жить. Ты... вряд ли".

traits.locale_text: "This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The psyker is useful enough for me to be left alive. You... hardly."
"This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The psyker is useful enough for me to be left alive. You... hardly."

"This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... hardly."

"This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... less so."

"This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... less so."

"This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... less so."

languages.text: «Este es el puente que conecta nuestras mentes, creado por la voluntad de mi esclavo. Deberías envidiar su destino. El {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} me es lo bastante útil como para dejarle vivir. Tú... mucho menos».
languages.original_text: "This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... less so."

traits.locale_text: «Este es el puente que conecta nuestras mentes, creado por la voluntad de mi esclavo. Deberías envidiar su destino. El {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} me es lo bastante útil como para dejarle vivir. Tú... no».

languages.text: 「これは我々の精神をつなぐ橋であり、我の奴隷の意志によって作られたものだ。その{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}は生かして利用する価値がある。お前は…そこまでではない」
languages.original_text: "This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... less so."

traits.locale_text: 「これは我々の精神をつなぐ橋であり、我の奴隷の意志によって作られたものだ。その{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}は生かして利用する価値がある。お前は…そこまでではない」

languages.text: “这里是链接我们思想的桥梁，由我奴隶的意志建造，你该羡慕他的命运才是。那个{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}对我很有用，于是我留了他一命。至于你……恐怕没那么有用。”
languages.original_text: "This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... less so."

traits.locale_text: “这里是链接我们思想的桥梁，由我奴隶的意志建造，你该羡慕他的命运才是。那个{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}对我很有用，于是我留了他一命。至于你……几乎没什么用。”

languages.text: « Vous êtes à l'endroit où nos esprits se rejoignent, celui que la volonté de mon esclave a créé, et vous allez bientôt me supplier de connaître le même sort. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} a une certaine utilité, il restera en vie... Quant à vous... rien n'est moins sûr. »
languages.original_text: "This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... less so."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes à l'endroit où nos esprits se rejoignent, celui que la volonté de mon esclave a créé, et vous allez bientôt me supplier de connaître le même sort. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} a une certaine utilité, il restera en vie... Quant à vous... »

languages.text: "Das ist die Brücke, die Euren Verstand mit dem einen verbindet, erschaffen vom Wille meines Sklaven — den Ihr um sein Schicksal beneiden solltet. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} ist nützlich genug für mich, dass ich ihn am Leben lasse. Ihr ... eher weniger."
languages.original_text: "This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... less so."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist die Brücke, die Euren Verstand mit dem einen verbindet, erschaffen vom Wille meines Sklavens — den Ihr um sein Schicksal beneiden solltet. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} ist nützlich genug für mich, dass ich ihn am Leben lasse. Ihr ... wohl kaum."

languages.text: "Bu, zihinlerimizi bağlayan köprüdür. Akıbetine imreneceğin kulumun ürünüdür. {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Ruhsezer{/g}, sağlığında işime yarıyor. Sense... Pek yaramıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "This is the bridge that connects our minds, created by the will of my slave — whose fate you should be envying. The {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is useful enough to me to be left alive. You... less so."

traits.locale_text: “Bu, zihinlerimizi bağlayan köprüdür. Akıbetine imreneceğin kulumun ürünüdür. {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Ruhsezer{/g}, canının bedeli kadar işime yarıyor. Ama sen... Pek yaramıyorsun.”
